Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuestMenu, PaymentMenu, ReservationMenu, RoomMenu, RoomServiceMenu

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Menu of the whole system. Contains Share Static methods which can be called by the Sub-Menu
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

      • mainMenu

        public static void mainMenu()

      • guestNameSearch

        public static java.lang.String guestNameSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                                               java.lang.String identifier)
        This method will check the if the identifier can be found in the guestList. If the identifier can be found in the guestList, the IC (Identity Card Number) will be return. If the identifier does not exist within the guestList, an empty string - "" will be return instead.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        identifier - The name of this guest.
        Returns:
        This Guest's identity card number.

      • genericSearch

        public static int genericSearch(java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.lang.String identifier,
                                java.util.ArrayList<?> list)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                java.lang.SecurityException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        This Method is a general search template for every classes. The methodName retrieve result from the list which will be compared against the identifier. Upon any matches, this method will return the row in which the match has been discovered. If no matches occur throughout the list, this method will return -1.
        Parameters:
        methodName - A getter method. The class in which the getter method is derived from is based on the list.
        identifier - The information which the method will compare against.
        list - The ArrayList of a wild card class.
        Returns:
        The row number of the identifier if it is found in the list. Otherwise, it returns -1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

      • searchRoomType

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Room> searchRoomType(java.lang.String roomType,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                                       java.util.Date checkIn,
                                                       java.util.Date checkOut)
        This method searches for the roomType in the roomList
        Parameters:
        roomType - The room type that the user desire.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        checkIn - Check In Date used to check for available room at that moment.
        checkOut - Check Out Date used to check for available room at that moment.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Room objects which match the roomType and does not have date which overlaps with checkIn and checkOut.

      • overLappingDateCheck

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Room> overLappingDateCheck(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                                             java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                                                             java.util.Date checkIn,
                                                             java.util.Date checkOut)
        This method will check if the check in and check out dates of a guest that is making a reservation overlaps with the date which is already present in the reservationList and roomList. This method is also use for checking if
        Parameters:
        roomList - - An ArrayList which contains the room details.
        reservationList - - An ArrayList which contains the reservation details.
        checkIn - - The intended check in or start of maintenance date.
        checkOut - - The intended check out or end of maintenance date.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList which contains information of room that does not have overlapping dates.

      • rsTotal

        public static double rsTotal(java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                             java.lang.String identifier)
        This method calculates the total amount of RoomService ordered based on the identifier.
        Parameters:
        serviceList - This list contains all the room services ordered by the Guest.
        identifier - The roomID that the user wish to inquire.
        Returns:
        the total amount of the hotel charge for the room service made by the Guest.

      • roomServiceSearch

        public static java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> roomServiceSearch(java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuList,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                                                 java.lang.String roomNo)
        This methods checks if the roomNo matches with the RoomId field in serviceList. For all matches, it will be added to itemsOrdered ArrayList and also be removed from serviceList.
        Parameters:
        serviceList - This list contains all the room services ordered by the Guest.
        menuList - This list contains all the Menu items in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        roomNo - The roomID.
        Returns:
        A RoomService ArrayList of data when the roomNo matches the room ID field in serviceList

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method read and returns the user input .
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        the user input in String.

      • readNonEmptyString

        public static java.lang.String readNonEmptyString(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method read and returns user input. It will be invoke repeatedly if the user input is empty.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        the user input in String.

      • readInt

        public static int readInt(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method reads user input and parse it into a integer type format. Any inputs which are negative or 0 will cause the readInt function to be invoke repeatedly until the user input is able to be parse into a integer format.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        integer format of the user input.

      • readLong

        public static long readLong(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method reads user input and parse it into a long type format. Any inputs which are negative will cause the readLong function to be invoke repeatedly until the user input is able to be parse into a long format.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        long format of the user input.

      • readDouble

        public static double readDouble(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method reads user input and parse it into a double type format. Any inputs which are negative will cause the readDouble function to be invoke repeatedly until the user input is able to be parse into a double format.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        double format of the user input.

      • readDate

        public static java.util.Date readDate(java.lang.String prompt)
        This method reads the user input and parse it into date type format. If the user input is unparsable, the readDate function will be invoke infinitely until the user input is able to be parse into a date format.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A prompt message to request for user input.
        Returns:
        Date format of the user input.

      • strToDate

        public static java.util.Date strToDate(java.lang.String date)
        This method converts String to Date format. If date is a string "null", the function will return null.
        Parameters:
        date - The Date which will be formatted from string into date.
        Returns:
        Date format of the date and null when date is a string "null".

      • dateToStr

        public static java.lang.String dateToStr(java.util.Date date)
        This method converts Date to String format. If the date cannot be formatted into String, this function will return a String "null"
        Parameters:
        date - The Date which will be formatted from date into String.
        Returns:
        String format of the date and string "null" if date cannot be formatted.
